response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly impact and benefit your business operations. This innovative solution has been meticulously designed to address key challenges in your industry, offering unparalleled efficiency and cost savings. Given its unique features and market value, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This special offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible opportunity to leverage this technology without compromising on quality or performance.

We understand that every business is unique, and our team is ready to customize the implementation process to fit your specific needs. Our commitment to customer satisfaction ensures that you will receive comprehensive support throughout the entire journey, from installation to ongoing maintenance and optimization.

Considering the immense value this product can bring to your organization, we kindly request your prompt consideration. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your business's success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
